synopsis.text: With the arrival of a puzzling letter, the ordinary life of 16-year-old Naho Takamiya takes an unexpected turn. The letter, penned by her future self, foretells the arrival of a new transfer student, Kakeru Naruse, and warns her to keep a close eye on him. Initially dismissing it as a prank, Naho begins to question its authenticity when the letter's predictions start unfolding in reality. As she grapples with the mystery of the letter, she finds herself falling in love with Kakeru. However, the letter also reveals a heartbreaking truth: Kakeru will not be alive in the future. With this knowledge, Naho must navigate the complexities of her present, guided by her future self, to prevent the impending tragedy and ensure a different outcome for Kakeru.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
